attributes.additional_details:
With 1/2 of us at risk of developing a form of cancer, why not allow the people to have multiple options of natural treatments, which in this case is a plant. 

New research and studies have shown and proven the benefits cannabis provides for diseases and illnesses , such as MS, PTSD and metal health issues.
attributes.background:
Legalise Cannabis for medicinal purposes. Cannabis has many benefits that are being ignored by our Government. 

Misinformed facts have created a stigma, allowing a highly beneficial plant to not be recognised as a form of natural treatment.
